original_text: And Saul said to David, “You are not able to go against this Philistine to fight with him, for you are but a youth, and he has been a man of war from his youth.”
korean_text: 사울이 다윗에게 이르되 네가 가서 저 블레셋 사람과 싸울 수 없으리니 너는 소년이요 그는 어려서부터 용사임이니라

sentences.original_text: You are not able to go against this Philistine
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이 블레셋 사람과 맞설 수 없다

sentences.original_text: for you are but a youth,
and he has been a man of war from his youth.”
